headline: Is Lowe’s (LOW) Analyst Upgrade a Clue to the Power of Its Pro-Focused Strategy?
summary: On January 13, 2026, analyst Chuck Grom at Gordon Haskett upgraded Lowe's Companies from Hold to Buy, following earlier positive ratings shifts and upbeat Wall Street commentary focused on the retailer's professional contractor business, digital progress, and operational efficiency. This cluster of upbeat assessments highlights how Lowe's expanding Pro contractor footprint and improving digital capabilities are increasingly central to the investment case. Next, we’ll explore how this wave of...
